World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest world news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116World News | Latest Top Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/ 2023 年 12 月 28 日星期四 15:05:57 GMT 120
Former China central bank official jailed for 16 years for graft - CaixinA former Chinese central bank official has been sentenced to 16 years and six months in prison for taking bribes, leaking state secrets and insider trading as the ruling Communist Party tightens its grip on the financial sector. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 14:45:46 GMT RA7QAUVW6BK5NBHRVQ43EKDLKI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/former-china-central-bank-official-jailed-16-years-graft-caixin-2023-12-28/Reuters世界中国
DR Congo government rules out election re-run demanded by oppositionDemocratic Republic of Congo will not cancel the results of last week's presidential election despite repeated calls from the opposition for a full re-run of the disputed vote, government spokesperson Patrick Muyaya said on Thursday. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 14:43:32 GMT G6W2TB4QYNIBTA5672PDJWMRKM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/dr-congo-government-rules-out-election-re-run-demanded-by-opposition-2023-12-28/Ange Kasongo世界非洲
What and where are Russia's $300 billion in reserves frozen in the West?After President Vladimir Putin sent troops into Ukraine in 2022, the United States and its allies prohibited transactions with Russia's central bank and finance ministry, blocking around $300 billion of sovereign Russian assets in the West. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 14:27:24 GMT XTTVIYIVTFPJ7BW25UNTZAV33Q https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/what-where-are- Russias-300-billion-reserves-frozen-west-2023-12-28/Elena Fabrichnaya, Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
Aerial strike on Ethiopia church grounds kills eight - witnessesAn aerial strike on the grounds of a church in Ethiopia's Oromiya region killed eight people and injured five as they collected corn, two witnesses and an opposition political party said. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 14:24:50 GMT DQIQN476MNIK5KFFYUW46AHAVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/aerial-strike-ethiopia-church-grounds-kills-eight-witnesses-2023-12-28/Dawit Endeshaw世界非洲
Turkey fines popular TV series after religious controversyTurkey's radio and television watchdog RTUK on Thursday placed a two-week broadcasting ban on the popular television series "Kizil Goncalar" (Crimson Buds), a board member said, as it was deemed to be against "society's national and spiritual values". Thu, 28 Dec 2023 14:11:00 GMT GWKVM6LWIRN4RPBYT2K3Q6QJPQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-fines-popular-tv-series-after-religious-controversy-2023-12-28/Reuters世界中东
Brazil cracks down as wildcat miners in the Amazon shift their operationsDeep in the Amazon rainforest, Brazil is fighting destructive wildcat gold mining as it spreads from Indigenous lands into government-protected conservation areas. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 14:09:04 GMT VJKTTEOTYFNTRNXN6WLYK4VF6I https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/brazil-cracks-down-wildcat-miners-amazon-shift-their-operations-2023-12-28/Adriano Machado世界美洲
Egypt says it is awaiting responses on plan to end Gaza warEgypt confirmed on Thursday that it had put forward a framework proposal to end the conflict between Israel and Hamas in the Gaza Strip that includes three stages ending with a ceasefire, and said it was awaiting responses on the plan. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 14:03:00 GMT 3QQEAYNGWBJZNCSQVGNLBYXNJ4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/egypt-says-it-is-awaiting-responses-plan-end-gaza-war-2023-12-28/Reuters世界中东
Ukraine, without foreign aid, may postpone pension indexation - ministerUkraine's minister for social policy believes the country will be able to pay pensions even if crucial Western financial aid is not approved soon, but the planned indexation of pensions, to keep them in line with rising prices, may be postponed. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 13:58:33 GMT 7GFSSRVXNZPAHHI7CJT4RR6XEE https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-without-foreign-aid-may-postpone-pension-indexation-minister-2023-12-28/Reuters世界欧洲
US, Mexico to keep border crossings open, Lopez Obrador saysMexican and U.S. officials agreed to keep border crossings open, Mexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador said on Thursday, after several key rail crossings were temporarily shuttered due to high numbers of migrants arriving at the shared border. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 13:34:58 GMT IJLHB4ZO6RKJVOTWZ4GHBAMMRU https://www.reuters.com/world/us-mexico-keep-border-crossings-open-lopez-obrador-says-2023-12-28/Reuters世界
Turkey to reinforce military bases in N.Iraq after 12 soldiers killedTurkey will reinforce its newly established permanent bases in northern Iraq in the coming months, after 12 Turkish soldiers were killed in the region, President Tayyip Erdogan said on Thursday. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 13:24:42 GMT 2HP5CCWMWJOCDM3OL5TZ7SON5I https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/turkey-reinforce-military-bases-niraq-after-12-soldiers-killed-2023-12-28/Reuters世界中东
Freed hostage recalls fight to save children, fears for women still held in GazaTo survive the 51 days she and three of her children spent as hostages in Gaza, Chen Almog-Goldstein had to stifle the tears over the killing of her husband and daughter when Hamas gunmen burst into their home in Israel on Oct. 7. Thu, 28 Dec 2023 13:15:22 GMT OLZZYXVQONIE7NT36GANU76VBY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/freed-hostage-mother-fears-israeli-women-still-held-gaza-2023-12-28/Rami Amichay, Michal Yaakov Itzhaki世界中东
